name: Lost in Blobbo
description:
-Lost in Blobbo is a 2D Pixel art game themed by "Lost in Translation".

-Your shuttle is out of fuel in another world, you have to find a way to go back to your own world by overcoming the language barrier with the aliens in this world. But remember, if you can't speak the language, it may be hard to understand whether what you are saying is friendly or not...
